name: Kill 10 Super Mutants
solution: Head to West Tek Research Center. It resets if you leave the instance for 60 seconds.

name: Collect 10 Wood
solution: Visit Gilman Lumber Mill for lots of wood pile and log spawns.

name: Scrap junk to produce Antiseptic
solution: Go to the Spruce Knob Campground map maker and kill ticks for "Tick Blood Sac" (x2 Antiseptic).

name: Scrap junk to produce Aluminum
solution: Use a Tinker's Workbench to craft the material in bulk, then scrap this bulk material.

name: Earn 250 Caps
solution: Sell purified water (or West Tek weapons).

name: Pick 5 locks
solution: 5 can be found northwest of Anchor Farm.

name: Drink/Collect Nuka-Cola (all variants)
solution: Buying Nuka-Cola from Nuka-World counts, all variants are available required for challenges at the vending machines near the big tent.

name: Hack a Terminal
solution: Fort Atlas, upstairs on the right, Paladin Rahmi's terminal (level 0).
